attributes.action: abolish inheritance tax by cutting public services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The governments response to the petition to cut inheritance tax raises two ways in which this could come about. This petition is to channel a specific course of action, rather than follow the governments current line of inaction.

You can find the governments response to that petition at this address http://www.number10.gov.uk/output/Page10780.asp as background to why this petition has been created.
